author: acolytec3
content: Just to throw in my lot on this, when I implemented this change in the EthereumJS client, I think older versions of the EIP did include general language that the transaction should always be in the "Network Wrapper" format (what you specified above) when passing through the mempool/EL so it was more apparent that the RPC calls ingesting these transactions expected the same.  And would also be in favor of an update to the execution API specs to reflect this.  I'll look at dropping a PR for this in near future
